column15: Shri Sanjeev Sharma and Shri Devender Kumar Gupta have been participated in online tender and their bids found correct as per opening by tender screening committee
column20: As per comparative statement the bid offered by Sanjeev is amounting to Rs. 1218431/- only and found lowest L-1. Since the reserve price of the above works is Rs. 664567 only hence the committee recommended the approval of the work in favour of L-1
column31: Negotiation has been done with Sh Sanjeev Sharma Govt. Contractor and he agreed to carry out the works in Rs 990000
